name: UV-5R VFO Unlock
body:
### Purpose
To unlock those cheap Baofeng hand held radio keypads so you can enter out-of-band frequencies directly into the keypad on the go. Range is 130-180mhz and 400-520mhz. While I could open this range more the radio isn't capable of transmitting further than this.

### Legal
I hold no responsibility for what you do with this software. It is to be used by those authorized to operate in these frequencies or in emergency situations. Failure to comply with FCC regulations and laws could result in fines or jail time. I am not responsible if you do something stupid with something you shouldn't have downloaded. Use at your own risk.

### Breakage
This could brick your radio, don't use it if you don't want to take full responsibility for it. It's your hardware, not mine. Don't blame me if you break it.

### Windows

Simply download and open the exe file under the bin folder. Be sure to run the correct version based on your firmware.
Obtain your firmware with the following instructions.

```
Hold down the 3 key while powering on the radio
```

### Linux
Ensure you have ruby installed as well as rubygems

```
gem install serialport
```
Just run the program, enter the serial port path and wait for patching to complete.

### Designer Templates
[Video Demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jBzWj7572hg)

### Support or Contact
kr0siv at amateurcq dot com
